title: Irelia..
body: Okay, i main irelia but lately have been playing other champs, expanding my pool of champs and different lanes and i must say, even though i hate to say it, irelia needs a nerd, you don't understand her true power, she is a beast, the stun on her is crazy, and to add onto that the w passive of life steal so you can just take full ad runes and then a dorans blade and you have amazing sustain + her w adds onto that and her ult, she is one of the most op champs i have ever played (keep in mind i have played zed, fiora, fizz, riven and volibear) she can take on a team once fed, she is tanky yet does unbelievable amount of damage. i now only play her when want to certainly win lane. also RIP DFG.. you shall be missed

replies.body: Irelia is a must ban for me because of her broken kit, i either see her picked or banned, way too much damage while being tanky, her main problem is her true damage and that stun which last way too long, being stunned and then taking like 3 true damage basic attacks to the face while you cant do anything about it is poor design.

But the stun is not guaranteed. It only occurs if she does it to an enemy with more health % than her. That means, ultimately, you're chasing her because you've gotten her onto that lower health, which means there's room for counter-play.

If she does go in on you when you're low health, expect the stun, and play around it. Like, wait for her to lose her blade-surge on a minion or something, and then go ham with ignite.
